com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn
Class Action

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.swing.AbstractAction
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.ui.cmn.Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action, ActionListener, Cloneable, EventListener, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContextMenuAction
public class Action
extends AbstractAction

This class defines a type of Swing Action that can be augmented by the calling code.

By adding an ActionListener to this Action, you can call your own code when an ActionEvent is signalled to the Action itself.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Action

public Action(String name,
              String resIcon)
Constructs a new Action with given name and icon.

This constructor provides a convenient way to define the action name and icon by specifying them as MOJ resource ids. The action name will be obtained by calling Resource.getBundleText(resName) and the icon will be obtained by calling Resource.getIcon(resIcon)

Parameters:
name - the Action name
resIcon - the resource id for the action icon
See Also:
Action(String,javax.swing.Icon)

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event)
Handles the ActionEvent.

This method inturn calls notifyListeners(). You can either invoke super.actionPerformed(event) before or after your own code for notification to occur, or you can choose to notify the listeners by directly calling notifyListeners() in your own code.

notifyListeners

public final void notifyListeners(ActionEvent event)
Notifies all listeners of the specified event

putValue

public void putValue(String key,
                     String value)
Overloads javax.swing.AbstractAction.putValue(String, Object), and provides a convenient way to create an Action ICON using a resource-bundle key

Parameters:
key - The String that identifies the stored object
value - Source of Icon to use for this Action.
